skills.name: Python
skills.describe:
I have been using Python for two years. I can fluently use Python for daily programming, but I have to check the manual on some things and I'm not familiar with it's advanced usage.
I implement a game called Othello which is also named Reversi using pygame. It has a foolish AI with Min-Max Algorithm and Alpha-Beta Pruning. You can see the source code on https://github.com/IcePear-Jzx/Othello-AI.
I use Flask as the back-end framework of my personal website which you're visiting now. Source code is on https://github.com/IcePear-Jzx/My-Personal-Website.
Implementations of DP(Dynamic Programming), MC(Monte-Caro Learning), TD(Temporal-Difference), Sarsa, Q-learning, DQN, A3C and DDPG based on PyTorch and OpenAI Gym. Source code: https://github.com/IcePear-Jzx/SJTU-Reinforcement-Learning.

skills.name: HTML
skills.describe:
I can fluently use HTML to finish front-end design. Sometimes I need to check the manual.
I designed and implemented my personal website on my own. See http://jinzhe.xin/.

skills.name: CSS
skills.describe:
Haven't studied systematically, but it's enough to meet conventional design requirements with Google's help.
Most of the time, I use Bootstrap for convenience.
CSS file of my website written by myself: https://github.com/IcePear-Jzx/My-Personal-Website/blob/master/flaskr/static/css/my.css
